Hi nil, thanks the awesome build

I have a few problems though

First Steam doesn't work after install however the solution press F8 at start up, choose "Safemode with Networking Support" and update steam from there, it will then work fine in windows, will probably need to do future updates in safe mode, it's not really a prob but maybe a compatibility issue you'd like to resolve.

The next issue I had was with out of memory issues, which is strange because my PC has 4gb of memory, and in standard windows installs I've never had this message no matter what I have open, but now it seems I can't have a browser with multiple tabs open while say running a PC game, eventually the games crashes with an out of memory error if I do. I suspect this may be to the lack of a windows swap file, are you aware of this issue and any resolutions?

Thirdly is it possible to get rid of the picture of selena gomez from the system properties page, it seems kind of creepy having a picture of a little girl there.

Anyway
Thanks for the OS, hope you keep making these builds.
I ended up fixing all these issues, cheers.
